name: Portals of Dread
description:
Game status: EXTREMELY EARLY ALPHA

You wake up in a dark room without any idea why you are there.

All you can do is open the door and continue into the dark. What dangers lurk? What obstacles do you face? Find your way and see if you find a solution to why you are here.

The game is under construction, and in a VERY EARLY stage. If you buy the game and support the development in alpha stage, you will ofcourse get all the patches and the full game when it's finished.

DISCLAIMER: Expect the alpha version of the game to be buggy, AND pr 21.5.2019 the content is more a proof on consept than a game, but content will be added on a daily / weekly basis.
